item.description:
Art Work Shop

"IRON MELT"

SATURDAY MAY 28TH. 1 PM.

Cost: $35. tax deductible

OPEN TO ALL.

Andres Institute of Art

sculpture park & hiking trials

98 Rt. 13, Brookline NH. 03033

603-673-8441

Please contact the institute, and register for this ASAP. There is limited space.

Attending as a student:

Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:

Join me for an afternoon exportation of cast iron.   Our Instructor ( Sculptor ) Joesph Montroy  will demonstrates the process of working cast iron as it is melted and pored into a simple cast. We will also be doing a simple cast ourselves.

   Beyond that, I will be there, and do my best, as always to help you meet and connect, to as many of the people there as I can. I am also planning a Art hike / picnic before the work shop at the same location, at 11 am..

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group
